channel.title: How do I...?
channel.description:
How do I change action sprites. For example, I was changing the look of the dragon sword and I can change the sprite of the item when it's in your inventory, but when I replaced the sprites of the sword when it's moving, it didn't work. I don't understand why. What do I need to do to change the sprites of the sword moving?
RSCShadow or snoopy, I know what you're going to say. "You hate customs, remember?" Well, I'm not adding custom items to my server, I'm making customs for a server that only I play. Just for fun.

item.title: How do I...?
item.dc:creator: @rune2h rune2h
item.description:
@rune2h wrote:

How do I change action sprites. For example, I was changing the look of the dragon sword and I can change the sprite of the item when it’s in your inventory, but when I replaced the sprites of the sword when it’s moving, it didn’t work. I don’t understand why. What do I need to do to change the sprites of the sword moving?

RSCShadow or snoopy, I know what you’re going to say. “You hate customs, remember?” Well, I’m not adding custom items to my server, I’m making customs for a server that only I play. Just for fun.
